BCentities:
Various attribute are available to specify the ID of the constrained entities in different ways.
'bcListFile' a path to a list of entities ID of type entitiyType (see the BoundaryConditions tutorial)
'surfaceTags' the surfaceTags to which the constrained entities belong
'bcList' a simple list of entities to be constrained in the specified components
NOTE for the case of multi-component fields where 'bcList' or 'surfaceTags' are used, the user must also specify the 'component' attribute component = "x" or component = "x,y,z" or component = "y,z"
Each BC event needs a 'time' and a 'value' attribute
'time' can be: a single scalar a function handle of a scalar multiplier changing with time (t)
'valuel can be: a single scalar (constant in space for each dof), a path to a file with a list of values for each dof a function handle depending on space (x,y,z)
